sentences.en: A faulty signature may invalidate a cheque.
sentences.cn: 签名的笔迹不对会使支票无效.

sentences.en: Because the company has been taken over, the contract has been invalidate.
sentences.cn: 因为公司被合并, 合同已变得无效.

sentences.en: Failure to disclose all material information could invalidate the insurance.
sentences.cn: 如隐瞒任何重要事实,均可导致本保单失效.

sentences.en: Failure to disclose all relevant changes may invalidate your policy.
sentences.cn: 未能披露所有的相关变化会令保单无效。

sentences.en: In the contrary situation, they do not entirely invalidate or counterbalance the particular accidental determination.
sentences.cn: 反之, 这一特殊非主要决定因素并不完全无效或被抵消.

sentences.en: No such Variation shall vitiate or invalidate this Contract.
sentences.cn: 任何该等变更都不会影响本合同或造成本合同失效.

sentences.en: Printing and other quality control errors will not invalidate an otherwise valid prize claim.
sentences.cn: 印刷或其他质量问题不会使有效得奖券失效.

sentences.en: Remark: Rapid evaporation or application of sufficient heat will invalidate the result.
sentences.cn: 注: 快速的蒸发或用热过当都将使测试结果无效.

sentences.en: The invalidity of one clause does not invalidate the agreement.
sentences.cn: 本协议任何一款无效不影响整个协议的效力.

sentences.en: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs may authorize other agencies to revoke or invalidate a visa.
sentences.cn: 前项撤销或废止签证,外交部得委讬其他机关办理.

sentences.en: The Security setting to invalidate version one signatures is set.
sentences.cn: 已设置使版本签名无效的安全设置.

sentences.en: These can evolve to invalidate piezoelectric devices with the constant or cyclic loads.
sentences.cn: 在单调或交变力电外载作用下,损伤可能逐步演化,并造成器件失效.

sentences.en: When her wave would crash, they fought because he would invalidate her need to be upset.
sentences.cn: 当她的波浪跌落时, 他们便开始吵架,因为他一心要消除她难过的感觉.

sentences.en: You must disclose all material facts. Failure to do so may invalidate the Policy.
sentences.cn: 所有重要事实必须如实告知,否则将影响此保险合同的有效性.

words.tran_cn: 变得病弱；因病而奉命退役

trans.tran_en: to make a document, ticket, claim etc no longer legally or officially acceptable

trans.tran_cn: 使无效，使作废，证明…错误，使站不住脚
